/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades adorned with colorful signs and advertisements that add a vibrant touch to the scene. Cars and motorcycles, the city's primary mode of transportation, are scattered throughout the street, hinting at the hustle and bustle of daily life. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the concrete jungle. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
